string.value: Exp 30,000 8,000 Meso Able to proceed to 'All taken away!' as next quest.

Dear traveler, it's nice to see you coming to our Kampung Village. Hope you will have a great time here. Kampung life is great, but nothing is more boring than staying inside the village with nothing to do, you know?

Unfortunately, recently, we're been bored here ourselves... And as a chief of the village, I feel the responsibility of bringing certain items as a source of our entertainment. But since I, myself, cannot possibly leave for hunting. Would you help me bring laughter to our village?
I believe #b100 #t4000466#s#k will do just fine. Hope it won't take too long for you to gather them. Now, hurry on!
It's so boring here without any music. You must understand how dull one's life could be without music!
This is just great! What a fine instrument a #b#t4000466##k is, don't you think?
Now, we will be able to enjoy ourselves as we play all the great traditional melodies of Kampung. Thank you very much!
You haven't collected enough #b#t4000466##k yet. Without them, we're just as dull as a wooden stick!
